duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver personalized tutoring sessions for individual students aiming to excel in AP Physics.
Develop and adapt teaching materials to cater to the learning style and pace of each student.
Facilitate small group classes and large live classes to provide collaborative and engaging learning experiences.
Offer instant tutoring for subject-specific, on-demand learning sessions.
Utilize Varsity Tutors' online platform to connect with and teach students remotely.
Assess and analyze student performance to identify areas for improvement and provide targeted support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physics, Education, or a related field (Master's preferred)
